author: Michael Malley
title: '90 Day Fiance' Vanja Grbic Shocks With New Obsession Amid Heartbreak
text:
90 Day Fiance star Vanja Grbic has left many people scratching their heads due to her decisions. The 42-year-old faced two heartbreaks during her time in Croatia. The latest Tell-All segment featured Vanjaâ€™s disgusting revelation about Josko Luketin. However, Vanja is doing much better behind cameras and even shared one of her obsessions. Keep reading to see what it was.
90 Day Fiance : Fans Want Josko Luketin To Face Consequences A Reddit thread recently surfaced calling out Josko for his disturbing confession . Vanja revealed that he recorded their intimate moment without her consent. However, Josko said that he didnâ€™t mean to do anything bad with Vanja and apologized for what he did.
Vanja Grbic From 90 Day Fiance, TLC, Sourced From TLC YouTube Many 90 Day Fiance fans believe Josko only apologized because he was exposed. Niles and Adnan, who have been having a feud, ended up sharing the same opinion and criticized Josko for the horrible thing that he did.
Vanja Shares Obsession Amid Heartbreak Despite all the heartbreaks, Vanja Grbic continues to share her happy life online. In an Instagram post , the 90 Day Fiance star shared a clip from her home showing off her â€œobsession.â€ According to Vanja, sheâ€™s been collecting shoes for quite some time. She has an entire room filled with her shoes, which she mostly uses for her belly dancing career. Vanja also organized them by color, showing her passion for her collection. The reality TV personality received positive comments for her hobby.

What a fantastic idea ðŸ’¡ love the turning rack.â€ 90 Day Fiance : Vanja Grbic Hangs Out With Cast Members Vanja Grbic has also been thriving in her career as a professional belly dancer. But aside from her job, the 90 Day Fiance star has also built relationships with some cast members from the past seasons. She recently uploaded photos with the Pillow Talk cast, such as Tim Malcom, Veronica Rodriguez, Andrei Castravet, Elizabeth Potthast, Kobe Blaise, and Emily Bieberly. She captioned, â€œWhat a super fun time hanging out with this crew! Kisses for all! How did you guys enjoy watching the Pillow Talk I crashed?â€
